overview: Philipp Breuss-Schneeweis studied computer science and history at the University of Salzburg and the Bowling Green State University, Ohio. After working for various companies including KPMG Consulting and Sony DADC he founded Mobilizy GmbH, a software startup specializing in Augmented Reality software for smartphones. The flagship product Mobilizy is the â€œWikitude World Browserâ€ which is an Augmented Reality browser for geospatial content. One of the initial successes of Mobilizy has been the Top 50 award at the Google Android Developer Challenge and being named as â€œTop 10 mobile Applications to watch in 2009â€ in the Razorfish Digital Outlook Report 2009.
